app.name: Barcelona Map
app.description: An interactive map of Barcelona with state persistence.

methods.onClick: try { window.morpheoMapZoomIn(); } catch(error) { console.error('Error zooming in:', error); }
try { window.morpheoMapZoomOut(); } catch(error) { console.error('Error zooming out:', error); }
try { window.morpheoToggleMarkerMode(); } catch(error) { console.error('Error toggling marker mode:', error); }
try { window.morpheoResetMapView(); } catch(error) { console.error('Error resetting view:', error); }
try { window.morpheoClearMarkers(); } catch(error) { console.error('Error clearing markers:', error); }
